TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted. but it is time reversing fruit so it flies away and unrotts.

Iwish to have an implosion grenade.

Granted. You forget how to count to three and blow yourself up.

I wish I won the lottery.

Granted, but taxes take away 25% of it and you are pressured into spending the rest on your family.

I wish I could internet.

Granted: http://www.1112.net/lastpage.html

I wish that the link above wasn't real.

granted. the webpage is 404 now,but suddenly the entire internet got deleted.

I wish i had a four leaf clover.

Granted. It harbors a new form of cordyceps that can infect humans, and you get turned into a fungus-zombie.

I wish other drivers would remember to turn off their damn high beams when facing oncoming traffic.

Granted. High beams are all they have.

I wish for a new solar panel. Mine's broken.

Granted. you get a new solar panel,but it costs a ton more in the VAB.

I wish i had a spaceship so fast it can speed up time.

Granted, but it can't slow down again.

I wish to be or not to be. Is that the question?

Granted. You are now a hologram.

I wish for 2 million pieces of copper.

Granted. 2 million meter-wide pieces of copper appear in your brain stem.

I wish that space

Granted. You turn into space, AKA nothingness.

I wish for a space shuttle

A Wild Kerbal Shuttle appears. Explosions ensue.

I wish for tanks!!

granted. a Wild IS-6 appears and shoots you

i wish to tame the wild IS-6.

Granted. It feels threatened by the modern way of life, and calls to it's IS-6 pack and they destroy the universe to make room for the IS-6 nesting grounds.

I wish that the word undefinable was undefinable.

Granted. But since undefinable is now undefinable, undefinable cannot be defined. Thus undefined cannot be undefinable, and the undefinable is now undefinable.

The resulting paradox destroys the Universe.
I want a peace of bacon

Granted, you are now a piece of bacon.

I wish people would remember to wish.

granted. but then nobody corrupts the wishes.

I wish jeb.

granted. you are now jeb kerman now dying in reentry on kerbin.

I wish that solar panels were everywhere.

Granted, but now it is too hot for life to exist.

I wish that Herobrine didn't exist in Minecraft

Granted. Since he doesn't (please don't tell me you're one of those [sCRUBS] who think it's real) your wish has been wasted and the thread OP comes and kills you with a knife.

I wish for a Tu-95

Edited March 10, 2015 by mythbusters844

Granted. Since he doesn't (please don't tell me you're one of those [sCRUBS] who think he's real) your wish has been wasted and the thread OP comes and kills you with a knife.

I wish for a Tu-95

OT: I'm not, I just wanted to HAVE a wish so I used that

Granted. It comes with primed nukes, so you are apprehended by your local secret police/government unit (FBI, CIA, MI6).

This is a response to mythbuster, because sampa did not wish.

I wish for a world-crushing army under my control.

Edited March 9, 2015 by SelectHalfling0

Granted. They completely destroy the world and its atmosphere and you die from asphyxiation.

I wish for a TI-95
